name: bantay-barangay-malagutay
description: Disaster Response Platform for Barangay Malagutay

scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm test" "cd client && npm test"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:coverage" "cd client && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint:fix" "cd client && npm run lint:fix"

author: BantayBarangay Development Team
